data.title: The Garden of Rama, First Edition
data.meta_description: The Garden of Rama by Clarke, Arthur C., Lee, Gentry and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Condition: Very Good. First Edition. Former library book; may include library markings. Used book that is in excellent condition. May show signs of wear or have minor defects.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. A Fine 1st edition with the complete number row. Tight and clean, it's without remainder mark and without previous owner's markings. The DJ shows light rubbing to black, along with minimal corner wear to lower back corners. Not price clipped.

Hardcover. Condition: As New. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. First Edition. A fine unread 1st impression in a fine dustwrapper priced at Â£14.99 on the inside flap.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: N-Fine. First Edition/First Printing. A square solid tight clean unread unused copy. The laminate on the priced jacket is puckering around the raised letters on the front panel. I believe this is book three in the Rama series. A very nice copy. THIS COPY IS IN MY POSSESSION AND NORMALLY SHIPS NEXT DAY. Book.

First edition. The third Rama book. A fine copy in a just about fine dust jacket with separation a lamination along left front edge at spine. (28734).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First Edition; First Printing. Very Good/Very Good Condition. Dust jacket in protective Brodart Cover. The "Spectra Super Summer Proof of Purchase - Clip and Save" still present and attached. No marks on the text block. No marks of previous ownership or inscription. Nicely installed blue ribbon marker. First edition, first printing. ; Weight: 1.15 Pounds; 441 pages.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First edition. Very good in very good dustwrapper. Clean text in clean cloth covers with wear on edges, dustwrapper is clean but shows rubs. Please Note: This book has been transferred to Between the Covers from another database and might not be described to our usual standards. Please inquire for more detailed condition information.

Paperback. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. John Brettoner(Jacket Illustration) (illustrator). First Edition. Garden of Rama by Arthur C. Clarke (First UK Edition) File Copy A sharp, tight, copy. A bright dust jacket. Not price-clipped. States, "First published in Great Britain in 1991 by Victor Gollancz Ltd." File Copy. Author is the world's best known and bestselling science fiction writer. His collaboration with Stanley Kubrick on 2001: A Space Odyssey set new standards for SF films. BOOK.

Hardcover. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. 1st Edition. New York: Spectra - Bantam Books, 1991. First edition, first printing. 9 1/4 x 6 1/4 inches: pp. [6], 441. Original blue and black illustrated dust jacket with steel blue and white type, still has Spectra Summer Proof of Purchase clip and save strip attached to dust jacket. Blue board with purple cloth and silver gilt type on spine. Dust jacket has general wear with some creasing. Laminate is puckering around raised letters on front panel. Boards have some fading, discoloration at upper edges. Spine is slightly cocked. Text is unmarked. Binding solid. Third volume in the Rama series.

Hardcover. First Edition. Octavo; pp 441; VG/VG-; blue/black pictorial spine with light blue and white text; dust jacket has light rubbing wear to exterior; slight toning to flaps; mylar wrap; cloth edges lightly sunned; otherwise clean; strong boards; text block exterior edges have light tone; interior clean; good binding; signed by Gentry Lee. NOTE: Shelved in Netdesk office, Case #4. 1333388. FP New Rockville Stock.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. Complete 4 book set, all hardcover 1st editions. Rendezvous with Rama is a true First edition, 2nd printing B in the numberline, in near fine condition, contents clean, unmarked and tightly bound. Dustcover is also near fine, priced at $6.95. Volumes 2-4 are each, hardcover, 1st printings, Fine & unmarked inside & out. Dustjackets are each Fine condition and mylar wrapped. Complete 4 volume set.
